title: User information
cluster_intro: You need to configure the user ID and secret to bring your node online.
saved: Yep! All the cluster changes has been saved~
saved_intro: The changes you had already made have been successfully write in the database, you can leave this page without doing anything.
invalid_title: Cluster id or secret is invalid
invalid_intro: The cluster id or secret you entered is invalid, either because you didn't enter it or because the username has already been added.
